title: Ep. 790 - Controlling Words, Controlling Minds
description:
Don Lemon says Americans don’t view black men as human, a man will compete against women at the Olympics, and a young person dies of heart failure after receiving the COVID vaccine.
My new book ’Speechless: Controlling Words, Controlling Minds,’ is now available wherever books are sold. Grab your copy today here: https://utm.io/uds0D
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
